name: Lionmane Tea
entries: Preparation: Requires Cook's or Brewer's Tools to prepare.

Effect: You gain a +1 bonus to Wisdom saving throws and can use your reaction to automatically succeed on one saving throw to resist fear. Once you use this reaction you lose all the bonuses of this meal.

description.chatFlavor: +1 Wis saves, reaction to auto-succeed vs fear (once).
